text:
If the FHR remains below 120 or above 160 beats per minute even aft  er 30 minutes and 
the woman is in early labour, then do the following:
/lozenge6 Explain the situation to the family.
/lozenge6 Start an intravenous line with Ringer Lactate.
/lozenge6 Administer intranasal oxygen, if available.
/lozenge6 Keep the woman lying on her left   side throughout the time she is being 
transported. 
/lozenge6 Refer her to an FRU, which has facilities for the resuscitation of newborns.
